dict.acceptation: 警告；征候，预兆；前车之鉴；
警告的；告诫的；引以为戒的；
警告( warn的现在分词)；提醒；告诫；预先通知；

sent.orig: Early-warning indexes early-warning intensities are given and an early-warning model based on BP neural network i.
sent.trans: 通过确定预警指标、划分预警警度，建立基于BP人工神经网络的预警模型。

sent.orig: Overtemperature dual warning function, warning temperature range is set at discretion.
sent.trans: 超温双重报警系统。报警范围自由设定。

sent.orig: The system composition, line warning device, main warning device and inner data communication protocol were introduced.
sent.trans: 介绍了系统的组成、列告警器、总造警仪设计和内部数据通信具体约定。

sent.orig: Ultraviolet( UV) warning theory and configuration of UV warning system were introduced.
sent.trans: 介绍了紫外告警原理及紫外告警系统的结构组成。

sent.orig: Warning system: to automatically eligible for warning units, visual information, eye-catching.
sent.trans: 预警系统：能自动对符合条件的个股进行预警，信息直观、醒目。
